title: Calculate the bisilhouette of a biclustering
text: ilustrate use bisilhouette function takes input N×pN\times pdata matrix, bicluster membership informtation encoded via row_clustering col_clustering. row_clustering binary matrix contains 1 element [,j] row bicluster j col_clustering binary matrix contains 1 element [,j] column bicluster j bisilhouette package compatible output functions popular biclustpackage; Biclust object returned biclust function biclust package, bisilhouette can used followed:
code: data <- matrix(rnorm(50), nrow = 10) row_clustering <- cbind(   rbinom(10, 1, 0.5),   rbinom(10, 1, 0.5),   rbinom(10, 1, 0.5) ) col_clustering <- cbind(   rbinom(5, 1, 0.5),   rbinom(5, 1, 0.5),   rbinom(5, 1, 0.5) ) bisil <- bisilhouette(data, row_clustering, col_clustering) bisil$bisil # the bisilhouette score bisil$vals # a list containing vectors of the bisilhouette coefficients for each bicluster bisilhouette(data, Biclust@RowxNumber, Biclust@NumberxCol)

title: Bisilhouette plot — bisil_plot
code: bisil_plot(   data,   row_clusters,   col_clusters,   filename = NULL,   method = "euclidean",   h = 6,   w = 6 )

title: Bisilhouette plot — bisil_plot
text: data matrix data (n x p). row_clusters matrix row cluster indices (n x k). col_clusters matrix column cluster indices (p x k). filename filename save plot, NULL plot saved. Default NULL. method distance method use calculating bisilhouette score. Default "euclidean". h Height plot inches, default 6. w Width plot inches, default 6.

title: Bisilhouette plot — bisil_plot
code: data <- matrix(stats::rnorm(50), nrow = 10) row_clustering <- cbind(   stats::rbinom(10, 1, 0.5),   stats::rbinom(10, 1, 0.5),   stats::rbinom(10, 1, 0.5) ) col_clustering <- cbind(   stats::rbinom(5, 1, 0.5),   stats::rbinom(5, 1, 0.5),   stats::rbinom(5, 1, 0.5) ) bisil_plot(data, row_clustering, col_clustering)

title: Calculate the bisilhouette score. — bisilhouette
code: bisilhouette(   data,   row_clustering,   col_clustering,   method = "euclidean",   seed = TRUE,   n_reps = 10 )

title: Calculate the bisilhouette score. — bisilhouette
text: data data matrix, shape (N, p). row_clustering binary matrix indicating row clustering, shape(N, k). col_clustering binary matrix indicating column clustering, shape(p, k). method distance metric use, str. Default "euclidean". seed seed seed set random number generation, int. Default FALSE. n_reps number repetitions random biclusters added, int. Default 10.

title: Calculate the bisilhouette score. — bisilhouette
text: list containing; - bisil: bisilhouette score, float. - vals: individual sample scores, shape (N, ).
